Yoga is a practice that connects the body, breath, and mind. This practice uses physical postures, breathing exercises, and meditation to improve overall health.

Yoga can improve your overall level of fitness, posture, and flexibility. It can also lower blood pressure and heart rate, help to relax, improve self-confidence, reduce stress, improve coordination, improve concentration, help you sleep better, aid digestion.

It is a non-competitive system of gentle physical exercise and self-paced stretching. Each pose flows into the next without pause, ensuring that the body is in constant motion.
Tai Chi is an ancient discipline that offers relaxation, reduces stress and anxiety, while improving the flexibility of the body and the balance of the mind.
In the Yang mode, long and smooth movements are performed. It is highly recommended for beginners and older people.
In the Chen mode, you go from relaxation to exercise in a single movement. It is suitable for people more trained in this discipline as it requires greater physical effort.
WE INVITE YOU TO PARTICIPATE IN OUR TAI-CHI ACTIVITY!
Recreational activities are all activities carried out by the subject in free time freely chosen that provide pleasure and personality development.
The action carried out by a living being or an entity can be called an activity. Recreational, meanwhile, is an adjective that refers to what offers recreation (entertainment, fun or distraction).

Outdoor recreational activities often involve physical activity and therefore produce health benefits for people, which is why outdoor recreation is promoted as a means of improving health and improving the performance of basic movement patterns.

Reading is a process in which an individual knows certain information through visual or written language. The reader faces certain words, numbers or symbols, translates them into information within his mind, decodes them and learns.
Reading is a cognitive process that has many benefits for peopleÂ´s mental, emotional and social health. Those who read more regularly acquire what is known as a "reading habit.

Among the main advantages of reading is to allow to acquire knowledge and increase communication capacity, help develop the ability to analyze and solve problems, it is an entertainment option, allow to develop empathy and interpersonal relationships, allow to release emotions, stimulate concentration, among others.
Picture 1. Photograph taken after the session
WE INVITE YOU TO PARTICIPATE IN OUR READING ACTIVITY!
Physical activity consists of recreational or leisure activities, travel, chores, games, sports, or scheduled exercises in the context of daily, family, and community activities
The practice of moderate physical activity in daily life significantly improves health in all its aspects. Helps prevent diseases and improve physical, mental and emotional capacities.

Older people who do some physical activity are much more coordinated, which helps them reduce the risk of accidents such as trips or falls in the elderly. Another great benefit of being active is that your mood is greatly improved, as well as reducing stress and insomnia.
